footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Emilie | Update Date: 01/28/2025 | Editor: doomuh

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Lumidouce Elegy__
Signature weapon. Emilie’s best weapon by a noticeable margin. Its Energy restoration enables consistent Bursts with minimal ER% investment. 
__Calamity Queller__
A strong option due to the huge amount of ATK it provides. To utilize this weapon’s passive, make sure to use Emilie’s Skill after casting her Burst.
__Deathmatch__
Battlepass weapon. Emilie’s best 4-star option. At higher refinements, it is capable of outperforming other 5-star Polearms.
__Missive Windspear__
Missive Windspear is Emilie’s best free weapon, but it was only available in the Version 3.1 Event.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Staff of Homa, Staff of Scarlet Sands, Skyward Spine, Primordial Jade-Spear, Crimson Moon Semblance, Vortex Vanquisher, Blackcliff Pole, Lithic Spear, Wavebreaker’s Fin, Prospector’s Drill__
All general stat-sticks might need teammate or rotation adjustments to trigger their passives efficiently.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> Dendro DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Fragrance Extraction
**2)** Elemental Burst: Aromatic Explication
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Shadow-Hunting Spear (Custom) - *Please see Notes*

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Energy Requirements__
With signature and no Dendro teammate: 140%
With signature and Dendro teammate: 100%
Without signature and no Dendro teammate: 190%
Without signature but with Dendro teammate: 150%
__Normal Attack Talent__
It is not recommended to level this talent, UNLESS playing C6 Bennett to have her on-field dealing Pyro DMG or triggering Burgeon.
